props.heading: Welcome to Chameleon Framework!
props.text: Chameleon Framework is a JSON based web-builder framework for building simple informative websites.

first.heading: Testing setup
first.sub: Setup your environment for testing your website
first.text: It is recommended to setup a simple HTTP server during testing to develop content for the website.

second.heading: Development setup
second.sub: Setup your environment for developing custom components
second.text: The framework is developed using React.js. All components are React components.

props.heading: See all rendered Components
props.sub: Go to this page to see all rendered built-in components.
props.text: To see the order of components rendered on page, refer to the /site/Components.json file. This will speedup your development process. Have fun!
